main: ^Hi there, you must be the Detective, Hi I'm Jonathan.
^Nice to meet you, what do you know about the murder?
^Nice to meet you, have a good day
reply: ^My wife Sally, is best friends with Peter's wife.
^Do you know anything about his death?
reply1: ^I kinda knew him, we got along but we weren't great friends.
^Try talking to Sally. She may know more than I do.
